entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
